snippet: Tom Brady sat out his second straight preseason game, while the guy that will replace him at the start of the regular season continued to make progress....
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady sat out his second straight preseason game, while the guy that will replace him at the start of the regular season continued to make progress.

headline.main: Brady Out, Garoppolo Throws TD as Pats Beat Bears 23-22
headline.print_headline: Brady Out, Garoppolo Throws TD as Pats Beat Bears 23-22
